LanguageData.CannotDoThisWork: {1_labelShort} cannot do this kind of work.
LanguageData.IncapableOfWorkTypeBecauseOfCapacities: This colonist is not able to do any work of this type because of his health condition.
LanguageData.SelectedWorkTypeWithVeryBadSkill: Warning: The average of relevant skills is very low.
LanguageData.PriorityOneDoneFirst: Priority 1 is done first. Priority 4 is done last.
LanguageData.IsPredator: This creature is a predator. When hungry, it will hunt smaller creatures - possibly including people.
LanguageData.IsInMentalState: This creature is currently in mental state: {0}
LanguageData.CurrentGoodwillTip: Current goodwill and relations status with this faction.
LanguageData.CurrentGoodwillTip_PermanentEnemy: This faction is permanently hostile. They will raid your settlements and caravans. Relations with them will never improve for any reason.
LanguageData.CurrentGoodwillTip_Ally: This faction is allied. They will send fighters to help you when they can. If relations fall below {0}, they will become neutral.
LanguageData.CurrentGoodwillTip_Neutral: This faction is neutral. They will trade and talk with you freely. If relations fall below {0}, they will become hostile. If relations rise above {1}, they will become allied and start actively working to help you.
LanguageData.CurrentGoodwillTip_Hostile: This faction is hostile. They will raid your settlements and caravans. If relations rise above {0}, they will become neutral.
LanguageData.CurrentGoodwillTip_NaturalGoodwill: This faction has a natural goodwill range from {0} to {1}. If goodwill is over {1}, it will fall by {3} per day. If goodwill is under {0}, it will rise by {2} per day.
LanguageData.PinArchivableTip: Pin or unpin this message.\n\nThe oldest unpinned messages will be removed automatically from the list after reaching the limit of {0} messages.
LanguageData.ResearchCostComparison: Project base cost {0} becomes {1} for you because of your tech level.
LanguageData.ResearchTechprintsFromFactions: Techprints are available from these factions via trade and quests:
LanguageData.TechLevelTooLow: Your faction tech level is {0}, but this project's tech level is {1}. Research speed will be multiplied by {2}.
LanguageData.QuestChallengeRatingTip:
Challenge rating. This is a general rating for how difficult the quest will be relative to your current strength. More challenging quests give greater rewards.

1: Normal
2: Hard
3: Extreme
4: Ultimate
LanguageData.QuestAcceptanceRequirementsDescription: To accept this quest, you need
LanguageData.QuestBedroomRequirementsUnsatisfied: free bedrooms that satisfy the title requirements of
LanguageData.QuestBedroomRequirementsUnsatisfiedSingl: a free bedroom that satisfies the title requirements of
LanguageData.QuestNoColonistWithTitle: a colonist with the title of {0}.
LanguageData.AcceptRoyalFavorDesc:
Whether you wish to be rewarded with {FACTION_royalFavorLabel} from {FACTION_name}.

If this is disabled, {FACTION_name} will offer other types of rewards instead.

This setting only affects newly-arriving quests.
LanguageData.RoyalFavorOn: You are currently opting in to receive {FACTION_royalFavorLabel}.
LanguageData.RoyalFavorOff: You are currently opting out of receiving {FACTION_royalFavorLabel}.
